name: Get Breach Report Reviewed and Approved by DPO
description: Sends personal data breach notification to DPO (Data Protection Officer) for review and approval of Data Breach Report.

resource.content:
DPO assessment of Data Breach Report is completed.

 

DPO Assessment Summary

  • This is a Valid Data Breach Incident
  • {% if vars.steps.Send_Risk_Assessment_Details_to_DPO.input.impactSeverityOnAffectedUsers in ['High'] %}Affected individuals due to this breach are at High risk. Hence, need to be communicated about the breach.{% elif vars.steps.Send_Risk_Assessment_Details_to_DPO.input.impactSeverityOnAffectedUsers in ['Medium'] %}Affected individuals due to this breach are at Medium risk. Hence, need to be communicated about the breach.
  • {% else %}Affected individuals due to this breach are at Low risk.{% endif %}
  • {% if vars.steps.Send_Risk_Assessment_Details_to_DPO.input.isReportDpoApproved == 'Approved' %}Data Breach Report has been Approved by DPO{% else %}Data Breach Report has been Rejected by DPO{% endif %}

params.data:
[
    {
        "Company Name": "{{vars.steps.Get_Compliance_Record_ID[0].dataCompliances[0].companyName}}",
        "Company Size": "{{vars.steps.Get_Compliance_Record_ID[0].dataCompliances[0].companySize}}",
        "Company Address": "{{vars.steps.Get_Compliance_Record_ID[0].dataCompliances[0].companyAddress}}",
        "Company City": "{{vars.steps.Get_Compliance_Record_ID[0].dataCompliances[0].companyCity}}",
        "Company Country": "{{vars.steps.Get_Compliance_Record_ID[0].dataCompliances[0].companyCountry}}",
        "Was personal data affected?": "{{(vars.steps.Get_Compliance_Record_ID[0].dataCompliances[0].wasPersonalDataAffected | fromIRI).itemValue}}",
        "Was the data encrypted?": "{{(vars.steps.Get_Compliance_Record_ID[0].dataCompliances[0].wasTheDataEncrypted | fromIRI).itemValue}}",
        "What was the data format?": "{{vars.steps.Get_Compliance_Record_ID[0].dataCompliances[0].whatWasTheDataFormat}}",
        "What was the data source?": "{{vars.steps.Get_Compliance_Record_ID[0].dataCompliances[0].whatWasTheDataSource}}",
        "Where data was hosted?": "{{vars.steps.Get_Compliance_Record_ID[0].dataCompliances[0].whereDataWasHosted}}",
        "Was the exposure resolved?": "{{(vars.steps.Get_Compliance_Record_ID[0].dataCompliances[0].wasTheExposureResolved | fromIRI).itemValue}}",
        "Is data misuse foreseeable?": "{{(vars.steps.Get_Compliance_Record_ID[0].dataCompliances[0].isHarmRiskOrMisuseForeseeable | fromIRI).itemValue}}",
        "What Happened?": "{{vars.steps.Get_Compliance_Record_ID[0].dataCompliances[0].whatHappened}}",
        "Cause of Data Breach": "{{vars.steps.Get_Compliance_Record_ID[0].dataCompliances[0].causeOfDataBreach}}",
        "Type of Data Breach": "{{(vars.steps.Get_Compliance_Record_ID[0].dataCompliances[0].typeOfDataBreach | fromIRI).itemValue}}",
        "Nature of the Affected Data": "{{vars.steps.Get_Compliance_Record_ID[0].dataCompliances[0].dataType}}",
        "Repercussions of Breach?": "{{vars.steps.Get_Compliance_Record_ID[0].dataCompliances[0].repercussionsOfBreach}}",
        "Mitigation Actions": "{{vars.steps.Get_Compliance_Record_ID[0].dataCompliances[0].mitigationActions}}",
        "No. of Affected Users": "{{vars.steps.Get_Compliance_Record_ID[0].dataCompliances[0].noOfAffectedUsers}}",
        "No. of Affected Data Records": "{{vars.steps.Get_Compliance_Record_ID[0].dataCompliances[0].noOfAffectedDataRecords}}",
        "Affected Users Emails": "{{vars.steps.Get_Compliance_Record_ID[0].dataCompliances[0].affectedUsersEmails}}",
        "Additional Comments": "{{vars.steps.Get_Compliance_Record_ID[0].dataCompliances[0].anyAdditionalInformation}}"
    }
]

message.content: The Data Breach Report has been sent to DPO for review.

arguments.operationTitle: Utils: Convert JSON into a HTML Table

steps.name: Create Task to Notify Affected Users

message.content: Created Task #{{vars.result.id}} - {{vars.result.name}} to Notify Affected Individuals about Data Breach.

resource.name: Notify Affected Individuals
resource.description:
{{vars.demoMode}} Below individuals are found to be at HIGH Risk by the data breach and need to be communicated about the same.
| Sr. No. | Affected Individuals | | --- | --- | {{vars.affectedIndividualsList | join('\n')}}
Click on **Notify Affected Individuals** Button

step_variables._temp: {% set item = vars.result['@id'] %}{% set _dummy = "| 4 " + "|" + (item | fromIRI).name + "| [*Click Here*](https://" + globalVars.Server_fqhn + "/modules/view-panel/tasks/" + (item | fromIRI).uuid + ")| ❌|" %}{{vars.description.append(_dummy)}}

steps.name: Create Task to Send Report to DPA

message.content: Created Task #{{vars.result.id}} - {{vars.result.name}} to send data breach report to Data Protection Authority.

resource.name: Notify Data Protection Authority

steps.name: Create Task to Update Breach Report

message.content: Created Task #{{vars.result.id}} - {{vars.result.name}} to get updated data breach report from Data Protection Officer.

resource.name: Get Updated Report from DPO

step_variables._temp: {% if vars.steps.Send_Risk_Assessment_Details_to_DPO.input.impactSeverityOnAffectedUsers in ['High', 'Medium'] %}{% set item = vars.result['@id'] %}{% set _dummy = "| 5 " + "|" + (item | fromIRI).name + "| [*Click Here*](https://" + globalVars.Server_fqhn + "/modules/view-panel/tasks/" + (item | fromIRI).uuid + ")| ❌|" %}{{vars.description.append(_dummy)}}{% else %}{% set item = vars.result['@id'] %}{% set _dummy = "| 4 " + "|" + (item | fromIRI).name + "| [*Click Here*](https://" + globalVars.Server_fqhn + "/modules/view-panel/tasks/" + (item | fromIRI).uuid + ")| ❌|" %}{{vars.description.append(_dummy)}}{% endif %}

step_variables.demoMode: {% if vars.result[0].dataCompliances[0].testMode %}Test Mode ON{% endif %}

step_variables.temp: {% for item in vars.affectedUsersTempList %}{% set _dummy = "|" + loop.index | string + "|" + item + "|" %}{{vars.affectedIndividualsList.append(_dummy)}}{% endfor %}

message.content: DPO has confirmed an Invalid Breach. The Incident can be closed now.

steps.name: Send Risk Assessment Details to DPO

schema.title: Data Breach Report Approval

inputVariables.name: isValidBreach
inputVariables.label: Please confirm if this is a valid breach?
inputVariables.title: Dynamic List

inputVariables.name: isDPIARequired
inputVariables.label: Is Data Protection Impact Assessment(DPIA) Required?
inputVariables.title: Dynamic List

inputVariables.name: reasonToPerformDPIA
inputVariables.label: Provide a reason to perform DPIA
inputVariables.title: Text Area

inputVariables.name: impactSeverityOnAffectedUsers
inputVariables.label: What is the severity of the impact of the data breach on the affected individual?
inputVariables.title: Dynamic List

inputVariables.name: measuresToReduceFutureRisks
inputVariables.label: Identify measures need to be taken to reduce or eliminate risks in future?
inputVariables.title: Text Area

inputVariables.name: isReportDpoApproved
inputVariables.label: Please provide your approval to send this report to Data Protection Authority(DPA).
inputVariables.title: Dynamic List

owner_detail.emailRecipients: {% if 'Test Mode ON' in vars.demoMode %}{{vars.demoEmail}}{% else %}{{vars.dpoEmail}}{% endif %}

resource.isValidBreach: {% if 'Valid Breach' == vars.steps.Send_Risk_Assessment_Details_to_DPO.input.isValidBreach %}{{"YesNoInput" | picklist("Yes", "@id")}}{% else %}{{"YesNoInput" | picklist("No", "@id")}}{% endif %}

resource.description:
{{vars.demoMode}}

##### DPO has confirmed an Invalid Breach. The Incident can be closed now.

routes.name: Add Comment for Valid Breach -> Create Task to Notify Affected Users
Create Assessment Data Table -> Send Risk Assessment Details to DPO
Create Task to Send Report to DPA -> Update Task  Description
Get Breach Report Updated by DPO -> Create Task to Send Report to DPA
Get Compliance Record ID -> Get Incident ID
Get Incident ID -> Create Assessment Data Table
Get Parent Task -> Update Parent Task Status
Is Valid Breach -> Add Comment for Valid Breach
routes.label: Yes

routes.name: Is Valid Breach -> Update Task Status in Incident
routes.label: No

routes.name: Notify Affected Users Task -> Get Breach Report Updated by DPO
Resolve Compliance Record -> Copy of Update Task Status
Send Risk Assessment Details to DPO -> Update GDPR Assessment Data
routes.label: Submit

routes.name: Update GDPR Assessment Data -> Is Valid Breach
Update Task Description -> Get Parent Task
Update Task  Description -> Update Compliance Record Description
